title: Public Survival

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: That's not failure. That's just how identity survives in public.
dialogue.context: Showing a group of people, the AI normalizes the compromises of social identity

scene_context: A 2-panel scene where the Architect presents a group of people while explaining that coherence isn't failure but necessary adaptation.
philosophical_theme: Social identity as survival mechanism rather than authentic expression
visual_elements: A group of people representing the public sphere where identity must function
